ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry

Class AbstractGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry.AbstractGeometry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bounded3, SceneElement, VisibilityFunction3, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeGeometry, PolygonalSurfaceOfRevolutionGeometry, PolyhedronGeometry, PrimitiveGeometry, PrimitiveListGeometry, TransformableGeometry

    public abstract class AbstractGeometry
extends Object
implements SceneElement
    Base class for geometry classes.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(int index,
                          Box3 box)
        Description copied from interface: SceneElement
        Determines if the surface of the specified primitive intersects with the given box.
        Specified by:
        intersects in interface SceneElement
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the primitive for which to determine intersection.
        box - A Box3 to intersect with.
        Returns:
        True if box intersects with the specified primitive or if it cannot be determined whether box intersects with the specified primitive. False otherwise.

      • generateRandomSurfacePoint

        public void generateRandomSurfacePoint(int index,
                                       ShadingContext context,
                                       double ru,
                                       double rv,
                                       double rj)
        Description copied from interface: SceneElement
        Generates a SurfacePoint randomly that is uniformly distributed over the surface of the specified primitive (optional operation).
        Specified by:
        generateRandomSurfacePoint in interface SceneElement
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the primitive from which to generate the random point.
        context - The ShadingContext to receive the generated surface point.
        ru - The first random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rv - The second random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rj - The third random variable (must be in [0, 1]).

      • generateRandomSurfacePoint

        public void generateRandomSurfacePoint(ShadingContext context,
                                       double ru,
                                       double rv,
                                       double rj)
        Description copied from interface: SceneElement
        Generates a SurfacePoint randomly that is uniformly distributed over the surface of this geometry (optional operation).
        Specified by:
        generateRandomSurfacePoint in interface SceneElement
        Parameters:
        context - The ShadingContext to receive the generated surface point.
        ru - The first random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rv - The second random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rj - The third random variable (must be in [0, 1]).

      • generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint

        public double generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint(int index,
                                                    SurfacePoint x,
                                                    ShadingContext context,
                                                    double ru,
                                                    double rv,
                                                    double rj)
        Description copied from interface: SceneElement
        Generates a SurfacePoint randomly that is uniformly distributed over the surface of the specified primitive (optional operation).
        Specified by:
        generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint in interface SceneElement
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the primitive from which to generate the random point.
        x - The SurfacePoint to be illuminated, that should influence the sampling distribution.
        context - The ShadingContext to receive the generated surface point.
        ru - The first random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rv - The second random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rj - The third random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        Returns:
        The weight for the randomly generated SurfacePoint.

      • generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint

        public double generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint(SurfacePoint x,
                                                    ShadingContext context,
                                                    double ru,
                                                    double rv,
                                                    double rj)
        Description copied from interface: SceneElement
        Generates a SurfacePoint randomly that is uniformly distributed over the surface of this geometry (optional operation).
        Specified by:
        generateImportanceSampledSurfacePoint in interface SceneElement
        Parameters:
        x - The SurfacePoint to be illuminated, that should influence the sampling distribution.
        context - The ShadingContext to receive the generated surface point.
        ru - The first random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rv - The second random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        rj - The third random variable (must be in [0, 1]).
        Returns:
        The weight for the randomly generated SurfacePoint.
